Item ID6036
This article is about the item used to cure plants. For the Lunar spell, see Cure Plant. For the strengthened plant cure used during Garden of Tranquillity, see Plant cure (Garden of Tranquillity).

A plant cure potion is used on diseased plants, during Farming, to restore the plant to a healthy state so it continues to grow. Farming shops sell them for 40 coins each, and GAG farmers at farming patchs sell them for 25 coins each. Plant cure can only be used on the same crop a single time throughout its entire life cycle.

Note: This will not work on dead plants. To ensure that your plant does not die, consider using an amulet of nature to monitor it, or pay a gardener to protect your crops automatically (gardeners will not protect herbs or flowers).

6 August 2020

An "Empty" option was added.
